Technical Documentation¶

Release:0.0.3
Date:July 28, 2011

KIP is custom lib for TD’s for writing and reading animation curve files with napalm support

  • Napalm Class Module (kip.kip_napalm_class)
  • Curve Class Module (kip.kip_reader)
